name: downtown...
description:
PLAY BROWSER VERSION IN FULL SCREEN FOR IT TO WORK PROPERLY, HEADPHONES ARE RECOMMENDED.

In this city, you're never safe.

You play as someone who has to make it to their apartment alive in a city riot.

Downtown... is a interactive fiction text only game that is creepy, dark and atmospheric. The choices you make will have consequences, and there are multiple different pathways and endings. You will have to make hard choices, but it can be the difference between life and death. Try to get all the endings, including the ones where you survive the nightmare.

I will put a link to the android version when it becomes available on the google play store.
